feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 7:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
